mapper.insert: insert into test_post(boardId, parentPost, postContent, postId, postReg_dt, postTitle, postUse, userId ) VALUES (#{boardId}, NULL, #{postContent}, test_post_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{postTitle}, '사용', #{userId})
mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select a.* from test_post a where BOARDID = #{boardId} order by 1) a) a where rn between #{pagesize}*(#{page}-1) + 1 and #{page}*#{pagesize}
